services.title: Data Services
services.description: Our data science services encompass comprehensive analysis of big data to extract critical insights, employing advanced techniques in statistical analysis, predictive modeling, machine learning, and data mining to drive strategic decision-making and optimize business performance

services.title: Full-Stack Web Development
services.description: We offer professional web development services to create custom, responsive, and user-friendly websites tailored to meet your business needs, ensuring a seamless digital experience for your customers across all devices.

services.title: UI/UX Research
services.description: We provide UI/UX research services to enhance user satisfaction by creating intuitive, accessible, and engaging designs based on in-depth user behavior analysis and usability testing.

services.title: Bass Lessons and Session Recording
services.description: We provide personalized bass lessons for all skill levels and professional session recording to capture your unique sound with high-quality audio production.

services.title: Mushroom and Fungi-based Startup Consulting
services.description: We specialize in consulting for mushroom and fungi-based startups, offering expert guidance on cultivation, market strategy, and sustainable practices to help your business grow and thrive in the mycological industry

aboutpara:
I am a detail-oriented professional with a unique background in psychology, research, and operations management.

Through my experience at the Rutgers Full Stack Web Development bootcamp, I've gained in-depth skills in Full-Stack Development, React.js, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, MySQL, Sequelize.js, and Blaze UI.

Blending my past roles in data analysis, stakeholder management, and project execution with my new web development expertise, I'm poised to create robust, user-centric web solutions. My proficiency in tools like R, Python, and Tableau now integrates seamlessly with my web development toolkit, ensuring holistic solutions that leverage both data insights and front-end/back-end technologies.

My commitment to delivering superior web-based solutions is deeply rooted in effective communication, strong organizational skills, and a thorough understanding of contemporary web frameworks and data science paradigms.

Outside of my professional pursuits, I remain a passionate independent researcher, exploring intriguing topics in psychology, wellness, and the psychedelic space.

As I venture deeper into the realm of full-stack web development, I am eager to contribute my unique blend of skills to dynamic teams and innovative projects.

resume.tagline: Founder & Lead Facilitator at Sporesun Enterprises | Full-Stack Web Developer | #ActuallyAutistic Polymath | Rutgers Bootcamp and CSUDH Alum | Seeking Opportunities

experiences.position: Mental Health Worker at Royale MHRC
experiences.bullets: Achieved a 25% reduction in relapse rate by formulating and implementing comprehensive support and treatment plans based on detailed patient assessments, Enhanced holistic patient care outcomes by coordinating effectively with clinical teams, Played a pivotal role in introducing innovative care strategies by conducting research on therapeutic practices,Upheld a 100% compliance rate with regulatory standards, emphasizing patient confidentiality and meticulous record-keeping

experiences.position: Founder/Operations Manager/Lead Facilitator at Sporesun Enterprises
experiences.bullets: Successfully identified and tapped into a market niche which lead to the founding of Sporesun Enterprises, Spearheaded a 3000% increase in sales by architecting and executing strategic sales and marketing campaign, Optimized business operations across multiple departments including finance, sales, and client relationship management, Leveraged market analysis data to set competitive pricing, ensuring a strong market position
